Text:
Episodes 13 and 14 subbed by the Toriyama's World staff can be found here: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3601819/

and:

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3601824/
It appears that the file marked DN 2 is actually episode 3, and the file marked DN 3 is ALSO episode 3.  The second episode (which has a major impact on the setup of the plot) is entirely missing.

I uploaded episode 2 with english subs here:
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3615572/Death_Note_episode_2_-_Eng_sub

since, as ReduxDengaku said, it's missing in this package.
